#{count},

mapper.delete: DELETE FROM synthesis_cutting_tool_location WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
UPDATE synthesis_cutting_tool_location SET is_del = 1 WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
mapper.update:
UPDATE synthesis_cutting_tool_location SET
synthesis_cutting_tool_code = #{synthesisCuttingToolCode},
location = #{location},
count = #{count},
is_del = #{isDel},
cutting_tool_code = #{cuttingToolCode},
synthesis_cutting_tool_bind_code = #{synthesisCuttingToolBindCode},
synthesis_cutting_tool_bind_rfid = #{synthesisCuttingToolBindRfid},
cutting_tool_blade_code = #{cuttingToolBladeCode},
id = #{id} WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}
